overview_summary: The adjacent landowners are private revocable living trusts, indicating family-held property with no evident corporate or organizational backing ([cardislawgroup.com](https://cardislawgroup.com/arizona/cochise-county/bisbee/estate-planning/revocable-living-trust/#:~:text=A%20revocable%20living%20trust%20is,flexibility%20in%20managing%20your%20estate)). neighbors.name: Bouchikas Family Revocable Lifetime Trust
neighbors.claims: Bouchikas Family Revocable Lifetime Trust appears to be a private estate-planning trust holding land in Cochise County ([cardislawgroup.com](https://cardislawgroup.com/arizona/cochise-county/bisbee/estate-planning/revocable-living-trust/#:~:text=A%20revocable%20living%20trust%20is,flexibility%20in%20managing%20your%20estate)). No records of this trust were found in Arizona’s corporate registries or political contribution databases, indicating it is not an active business or political entity (likely a passive landowner) ([cardislawgroup.com](https://cardislawgroup.com/arizona/cochise-county/bisbee/estate-planning/revocable-living-trust/#:~:text=A%20revocable%20living%20trust%20is,flexibility%20in%20managing%20your%20estate)). neighbors.influence_justification: Family trust with no public profile or institutional affiliations; no significant economic or political activity detected

approach_recommendations.engage: Identify the individual trustee or family representative and engage them informally; emphasize respect for their land legacy and address any concerns about project impacts on their property

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach the trust’s grantor or trustee (likely Lisa E. Stansbury) with community-focused dialogue; address any personal impact concerns and offer assurances or benefits that align with the trust’s long-term property interests
